PPLoc: Corporate Policies and Procedures database; Corporate Intranet; see link below
activities: Albemarle Corporation may collect and process personal information relating to job applicants to consider them for employment with the company.  Albemarle Corporation also may process certain personal information relating to employees for employment-related purposes (such as recruiting, promotions, career and succession planning, talent management, employee recognition awards, mobility, off-site assignments, training, benefits processing, budgeting, payroll, reporting, accounting, and organization of special employee events) and for compliance with legal obligations, policies and procedures.
contacttitle1: VP Total Rewards and Performance Systems
corpofftitle1: VP Total Rewards and Performance Systems
eucountries: Belgium, Germany, Hungary, Netherlands, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Albemarle Corporation will cooperate with relevant EU data protection authorities (DPAs) in resolving employee complaints concerning the company's handling of employee personal information.
